page.title: 20Facts/Figures Dunham Hill
page.content: {Dunham Hill}is the largest village in the Study Area. There are people living in houses. They live in either the village road or Talbot Rd. Our school is{Dunham Hill County {Primary.}We have{42 pupils}and{3 {teachers.}There are also{a Classroom {Assistant,a School Secretary, a Cook, {a Kitchen Assistant,2 midday Ladies {and a Caretaker.}The school's area is about{500 sq.m.}It was opened in {1969}and there are 3 classrooms,a hall and a library. *=*=*=*=*=*=*=*=*=*=*=*=*=*=*=*=*=*=*= These are the children who worked on the survey:_{RACHAEL COOCH (Editor) {LYNSEY POTTER,JENNY MOSS,YVETTE ELLIS {ALISON BEECH,IAN SULLIVAN,SARAH COBBE {MICHAEL HUGHES, JEFFREY PITCHFORD {PHILLIP OCEGO, ROBERT HAMBLING { MATTHEW MUNDAY.
